description: Provides insight into the usage of the depot

panels.description: Total depot space currently in use, on all nodes in the database added together.
panels.title: Depot's Fetch Queue

panels.description: Lists the number of bytes in the depot and percentage used, for each node in the database.
panels.title: Usage by Node

panels.description: Total depot space currently in use, on all nodes in the database added together.
panels.title: Depot in Use

panels.description: The number of lookup  requests during the selected time range.
panels.title: Look up Requests

panels.description: Percentage of cache hit when finding a file in the depot.
panels.title: Depot Lookup Hits %

panels.description: The Number of cache hits when finding a file in the depot.
panels.title: Look up Hits

panels.description: The total number of depot fetches during select time range.
panels.title: Attempted Depot Fetches

panels.description: Shows how the fetches and eviction sizes increase over time. Each point refers to the increase over the past 5 min.
panels.title: Completed Depot Fetches and Evictions

panels.description: Shows the number of new depot fetches, for each bucket, over time.
panels.title: Depot Fetches Time Distribution

panels.description: Percentage of failed depot fetches during the selected time range.
panels.title: Failed Fetches %
Running/Queued Uploads from Depot to Communal

panels.description: Shows the number of requests currently uploading a file to communal storage through the depot.
panels.title: Uploads in Progress

panels.description: Shows the number of bytes in running requests that are uploading a file to communal storage through the depot.
panels.title: Uploads in Progress's Size

panels.description: Shows the number of running/queued uploads over time.
panels.title: Running/Queued Uploads

panels.description: Shows the number of queued requests to upload a file to communal storage through the depot.
panels.title: Queued Uploads

panels.description: Shows the number of bytes in queued requests to upload a file to communal storage through the depot.
panels.title: Queued Uploads' Size

panels.description:
Shows the number of attempted depot uploads.

Only counted if UseDepotForWrites is enabled. Metric mirrors the dc_depot_uploads table.
panels.title: Attempted Depot Uploads

panels.description:
Shows the number of bytes uploads from the depot to communal storage.

Only counted if UseDepotForWrites is enabled. Metric mirrors the dc_depot_uploads table.
panels.title: Uploads Size

panels.description:
Shows how the number of bytes uploads from the depot to communal storage increases over time.
Each point refers to the increase over the past 5 min.
panels.title: Uploads Size

panels.description:
Shows how the number of bytes per second uploads from the depot to communal storage increases over time.
Each point refers to the increase over the past 5 min.
panels.title: Upload rate

panels.description: Shows the percentage of successful write when writing to communal storage through the depot.
panels.title: Successful Uploads %

panels.description: Shows the number of bytes per second uploads from the depot to communal storage.
panels.title: Upload rate

title: Vertica / EON / Depot
